Name: Xavier D
Title: Necklace road
Review: Near to the banks of Hussain Sagar lake, went in evening time, there was a carnival going on during the time.

Name: Jayavel D
Title: wonderland
Review: The necklace road is very beautiful and so impressive and suggesting every one to visit this place....

Name: Abhay Mehta
Title: Good night view
Review: One must have a drive on the Necklace road to enjoy its beauty. I prefer to go in the late evening hours or night for better view.

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Road around Hussain Sagar Lake
Review: Necklace Road is located all along the banks of the beautiful Hussain Sagar Lake and we had traveled through this beautiful road many times during our holiday in Hyderabad. We enjoyed the beautiful views of the vast lake and the beautiful Buddha statue in the middle of the lake while traveling through this road by car.

Name: Mutukuloju Pranay
Title: Walking Track
Review: Events and morning walk Track for many hyderbadies.good and should maintained well again much better.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: The best road of the city
Review: Go early morning around 6 am if you really want to enjoy. A number of attractions lie on the road including the Sanjeevaiah park, Rock garden, Butterfly garden, Dog park, Herbal and Spice garden, PV Gyan bhoomi and one of the highest flags in the country. There is also bicycle club from where you can take bicycles on rent. There are a large number of eating options as well.

Name: Rukitha sree
Title: Awesome necklace
Review: It's an awesome place where you will buddha statue and Indian National flag.cool nd peace full.especially during evening on weekend ..it looks amazing with many restaurants and public.

Name: moogul818
Title: A nice Walkabout
Review: Necklace Road is a boulevard in Hyderabad, Telangana, adjoining the Hussain Sagar Lake. It connects NTR Gardens to Sanjeevaiah Park. Stretched across a length of three-kilometre, Necklace Road connects three major parks of the city, namely NTR Gardens, Lumbini Park and Sanjeevaiah Park. The road runs from NTR Gardens and Lumbini Park in Hyderabad to Sanjeevaiah Park in Secunderabad, from there along the Tank Bund Road back to the NTR Gardens. This gives it a shape of a necklace. There are two boat boarding points - one at Necklace road and another at Lumbini Park. It  is wort a visit along with the other nearby attractions.

Name: Indusman248
Title: Auto Drive of the Necklace Road
Review: We took an Auto Rickshaw and paid him Rs 100 and he took us for a Necklace Road drive during the lunch time. Found the temperature little cooler and it is recommended to take a walk of the Necklace Road in the morning or evening as one would find many eateries.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: beautiful
Review: Necklace Road is like a walkway around hussain sagar lake. due to the lake's shape is in necklace shape the walkway is called necklace road. have a walk in night.

Name: Somnath
Title: Serence Place
Review: I visited this place on several occasions like marathons and family visits. Clean roads and silent ambiance.

Name: Alia M
Title: The world of street graffiti
Review: Other than the road is constructed in the shape of a necklace, it is filled with street graffiti. Very talented and crrative artists have left their mark on the walls and buildings. My personal favorite is the superwoman piece.

Name: KRAMA200
Title: A Good Place to Visit
Review: Necklace Road  around Husain Sagar Lake is one of the popular Tourist attaraction for visitors. Either you can drive around or walk around. The pplace is well lit in the night. There are lot of places for you to sit and enjoy like Lumbini Park,NTR Gardens etc. Do not miss the Eat Street to have a bite.Children will love it

Name: Roopa
Title: Why Necklace Road?
Review: You can see the road that is exactly designed like a necklace. That was awesome to see :) !!! and quite liked the name. It is apt.

Name: amitthecreator
Title: Necklace Road Hyderabad 500004, InNecklace Road Hyderabad 500004, In
Review: Necklace Road is one of the popular tourist spots of Hyderabad. It is named as “necklace” because the road from Sanjivaiah Park connects to Tank bund Road, which further connects to Lumbini Park and NTR Gardens and thus forming a circle that appears in the shape of necklace when seen from the sky.

Name: RaphsMum
Title: Good place for a drive!
Review: Good place for an evening drive though parking can be a big headache.Check into Eat Street for a lovely evening by the lake

Name: OnAir516505
Title: pretty but not neccessary to visit
Review: Its pretty if you are driving by but not something you should specialy go & see. So plan your itenarary that you can drive past at night.

Name: jainms
Title: Cool place to be there
Review: It's good for the evening times and a very great view of the hussain sagar lake & buddha statue located in center of the lake.

Name: MR_F00DIE
Title: Sunday mornings made better
Review: A nice place for an early morning walk/jog/stroll, made better by the "pet social" that happens every sunday morning- hyderabad's four footed friends meeting and greeting one another.

Name: S R V
Title: Traffic crawls for various reasons
Review: The well lit road around Hussain  Sagar Lake is called Necklace Road in Hyderabad. People drive around in this area to watch the Buddha Statue amidst the lake. The roads are crowded on week days due to office goers traffic  and on Sundays by week end tourist.

Name: Niya1315
Title: A busy road
Review: It is shaped like a necklace, therefore it is called a necklace road. It surrounds the Hussain Sagar Lake. A lot of hotels and eateries are there on this road.

Name: TravellingReddy
Title: The best place to spend evenings
Review: A place known for catching up with friends after a day long work and gives relaxation due to its serene surroundings.

Name: Charith C Raj
Title: Nice place for a stroll or a ride around the lake..
Review: Nice place for a stroll or a ride around the lake.. even in summer at night one can experience cool breeze while on ride. Also there many places to hangout and have snacks or meals like watersedge and other small parks. The area around lake has been cleaned up a lot since 2014. If you want a peaceful time avoid during valentines day, ganesha visarjan,.. and other such days.

Name: sree143in
Title: Status
Review: Necklace road is very famous place in hyderabad we can see here a lot of people everyday evening, comes here to spend time.

Name: YatriForever
Title: Stop and smell the roses !
Review: On a busy day, driving hectic from one place in Hyderabad to another location in Hyderabad, I ended up driving on the Necklace Road. This is almost a necklace shape road around the famed Hussain Sagar lake, right in the middle of the city. It was worth stopping for a while in one of the garden along side the road. It was refreshing, relaxing and enjoyable! Obviously,  you will end up seeing the giant Buddha  somewhere during the drive. The lake's  breeze is indeed has a calming effect. Even if you are in a hurry, it's worth stopping by to smell the flowers. The road has its own charm in the night.Count it on things to do.

Name: yemKeyAre
Title: Nice spot
Review: Nice spot for tourists and locals alike. Good choices for entertainment. Nice and majestic view of the lake.

Name: Prasad
Title: Nice place
Review: Necklace road in Hyderabad is very good to see. Had a night walk with friends last time in this road. Atmosphere is really cool and had a road side food here

Name: Ashish S
Title: Amazing walk on this Road
Review: It's a great place to have your morning walk. Place is neat and clean. It's a very good place to go as you get peace of mind.

Name: Noor Ali Abbas
Title: Lake View Drive
Review: Necklace Road lies on the northern and western sides of the heart shaped Hussain sagar lake. This road resembles a necklace which runs around the lake and connects Tank Bunk roa as well.The road looks beautiful with a long stretch of lush green lawns and trees. Major parks along the Necklace Road are Sanjeevaiah Park, NTR Gardens and Lumbini Park. Jalvihar Amusement Water Park is also here.There are many restaurants and eat-outs along the road. Also, there are toys and balloons shops for kids.Necklace Road Metro connects all the major parts of the city.

Name: Pithva_Rajan
Title: Place to roam arround
Review: This is the good place and one of the attraction to visit in the Hyderabad. A good place to roam around anytime.

Name: RitaKakkar
Title: Adorned by beautiful shrubs
Review: Like Bangalore, the soil here is red too and everything grows nice and beautiful. On both sides of the road, beautiful colourful shrubs are planted. We went early in the morning when the shops were not yet open, but I am sure that the place must look beautiful at night with the restaurants all lit up. We had a flight to catch in the evening, so could not visit again.

Name: MUKKU S M R S
Title: Necklace Road
Review: This is a good place to walk around the Hussain Sagar Lake. This is a hangout place with Friends and Family when tired

Name: hock c
Title: Do drive pass
Review: It's quite central in position - so it's very likely you will go pass/ along it ( reference :Hussain Sagar Lake ).

Name: MJROHIT
Title: A visit at night
Review: The long lit road is a good place to walk around, enjoy street shopping, relish in hyderabadi meals and all in pocket friendly prices

Name: Anu789
Title: Beautiful at Night
Review: Enjoy a breezy cool summer evening along the necklace road that goes around Husain Sagar lake. The Buddha statue is lit up at night and a beautiful sight to behold.

Name: kennice2016
Title: Fantastic view in the night
Review: One of the best roads to drive with a panoramic view. We find either side interesting to watch. The theme location in Hyderabad.

Name: dipali
Title: Goood place but not maintained properly
Review: The dazzling diamonds can be seen only from above after dark from a helicopter or a plane about to safely land.Down below, it is a lovely road to take a ride on its curving path.It has a nice view of the Hussain Sagar with parks and standby points from where you can gaze at the water front, sit on the chairs and simply laze. There will be  none to disturb you . There is an exhibition ground on the road. Most of the time, some event is on. A little further is the water world.It is excellent for a nice walk at night where the roads would be lit and you can see the statue of Buddha. The eat street at neckalce road is also a must go place which is meant for food lovers. when looked from a higher altitude, this road looks like a necklace around the lake, hence named as Necklace Road.After its opening, it saves a lot of time to commute from Khairtabad to Secunderabad. It also is a hub for lot of family outings, one can find fun events along the park. On weekends, there are lot of activity options for families. Ample car parking space at multiple places on this road. One should be very careful and cautious after 10pm, as might find miscreants around since the road gets very isolated.

Name: Nisshant
Title: Good Potential but unutilized
Review: The necklace road can really become a beautiful place to hangout with a amazing view to Hussain Sagar lake But the broken footpath and foul smell doesn't allow you to actually be there for a longer duration.This area should be cleaned and developed.

Name: Sumit S
Title: lost the old charm
Review: The place has lost its old charm. However you can visit this place at beautiful weather times in hyderabad

Name: GreenCarpet11
Title: Dazzling Diamonds
Review: The dazzling diamonds can be seen only from above after dark from a helicopter or a plane about to safely land.Down below, it is a lovely road to take a ride on its curving path.It has a nice view of the Hussain Sagar with parks and standby points from where you can gaze at the water front, sit on the chairs and simply laze. There is none to disturb you . There is an exhibition ground on the road.  Most of the time, some event is on.  A little further is the water world.

Name: ROBERTS ROSHAN M
Title: Good place for Family
Review: Visit in late evening. Pleasant atmosphere. Nice place for Family outings. Lighting is also good. Must visit.

Name: 73prashantha
Title: Loosing its charm
Review: It was very famous earlier. I remember going to this place often during my childhood days. It lost its charm now.

Name: Arjun Menon
Title: Nice Night walk-road.
Review: This is a road which literally goes with the name. This road surrounds the Hussain Sagar Lake (Pardon me if I am wrong in the name). It is excellent for a nice walk at night where the roads would be lit and you can see the statue of Buddha. The eat street at neckalce road is also a must go place which is meant for food lovers.

Name: Nish0901
Title: Road surrounding Hussain Sagar Lake
Review: This is a road surrounding Hussain Sagar Lake. It looks like a necklace. A lot of hotels, parks and restaurants are there on this road.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: must visit
Review: Best place for lovers and many of them will visit this place to hangouyt and will make sure they enjoy the nature.

Name: sravan s
Title: places for shopping and hangout with friends
Review: this is near to hussain sagar lake. the roads are always rush and people comes here to roam around and for shoppings.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Nice place..but be careful at late night.
Review: when looked from a higher altitude, this road looks like a necklace around the lake, hence named as Necklace Road.After its opening, it saves a lot of time to commute from Khairtabad to Secunderabad. It also is a hub for lot of family outings, you'll find fun events along the park. On weekends, there is lot of activity options for families. Ample car parking space at multiple places on this road.Be very careful after 10pm, as you'll find miscreants around since the road gets very isolated.

Name: ARUN63512
Title: GREAT VIEW IN THE EVENING
Review: It is a great view when the lights are lit in the evening to have a view from an elevated area, looks great

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: best but not safe road for night rides
Review: if you are that person who takes life lightly and have some fun and adventure then you are one for a treat.

Name: KenDeep
Title: Nicely built badly maintained
Review: This place is the living proof of what irresponsible citizens can do to any place. Sans the dirt this is a beautiful place. Nice waking path.  Beautiful gardens.  View of lake. Now comes the sad part. The lake is dirty.  There is dirt thrown all over the gardens. So if u are going for some nice jog or do enjoy the scenary, the place is not very appealing.

Name: Chaitali GK
Title: Nice road to drive along
Review: This road got name as necklace from Mumbai marine drive. This one is also has a shape of necklace and its good road for a long drive with nice music. you will find some good restaurants along this road which have nice view of lighted necklace road.

Name: Ambitesh G
Title: Love this place
Review: Spent hours on this road..i just love seeing people spending time with their families, playing football and having tea. A must visit place if you want to kill some time.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Soothing breeze
Review: The road in the shape of a necklace is to be visited after 11PM . Taking a bike ride in open air with soothing breeze from hussian sagar is mesmerising.

Name: arunlahre
Title: evening ride
Review: enjoy Mini Mumbai very beautiful during monsoon & ganesh festival. people love to take selfie during viist.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Traffic area
Review: MMTS station is available.Traffic is high. Good place for bike riding.good to visit at night time. Road will get damages if heavy rainfall occurs.

Name: idea614354
Title: A beautiful place
Review: Necklace road a beautiful place in hyd, you fall in loves when you visit here. very beautiful evenings you can enjoy here.

Name: Mahesh G
Title: Nothing much to do
Review: There are a few eateries scattered at some places. It is surrounding the Hussain Sagar lake. But the most annoying was the stink coming from the lake.

Name: moizuddinahmed
Title: Must visit during night
Review: This road is a place you wanna have a good drive or ride with your friend or spouse. It gives the wonderful view of the Husain Sagar lake and the Vast Indian flag in the middle of the lake just stands out and is the most beautiful thing about this place.

Name: 437rajendraa
Title: Very peaceful place for walking in the morning
Review: What a wonderful place in the heart of the city. I took auto and reached there. It was a  peaceful place I have ever seen in the heart of the city surrounded by a road on the lake. You can stay there for hours, but take the vehicle for up and down for one or two hours, walk in the morning and come back in the same vehicle. Good road, greenery and lake.

Name: Vivek G
Title: Too much Traffic
Review: The Necklace road is surrounding the Hussain Sagar Lake with a ring road. The road is new and having many flyovers. The road is busy mostly. The road starts and ends at the Lumbini park

Name: Trending T
Title: Good place to visit
Review: This place has very good ambience with a great look and will make your with friends and you can enjoy.You also have metro facility to have with.

Name: srk-rk
Title: Pleasant place to walk
Review: Necklace road has a lot of places to relax. It offers beautiful  A nice road to walk. It connects parks across the Hussain Sagar lake. Lots of restaurants, food court like Eat street etc. However, There is bad odour from the lake that dampens experience.

Name: Bindu B
Title: Beautiful driveway.
Review: A very well maintained connecting drive way in the heart of the city. Other than long drives one can find many entertainment zones, parks, eateries of all kinds enroute. Beautiful during  winters.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Good place
Review: It is a very good place to visit, especially in the evenings and at the night time.The fresh air from the lake and trees is quite good.

Name: Ravi Pratap Singh Chauhan
Title: A nice walk
Review: The road connects parks across the Hussain Sagar lake and is a nice walk in the evening. The stink of the lake is the negative point

Name: Srinivasarao K
Title: Very nice place for relaxed evening walk
Review: Very nice place for relaxed evening walk...it connectes somany places...lots of restaurants along the road...

Name: VishuMittoo
Title: Hyderabad ka Shaan!!
Review: A place to relax, breathe and find peace. I used to take my dog here and he loved this place more than we did. He found new friends and he played a lot. The only place where you are near to the main road but the traffic dies not effect you..

Name: Meghaa R
Title: Chilling place for couples
Review: The place is more filled up with couples and is a good place to chill mostly on weekends you will find more people there, take a long stroll there and enjoy

Name: Rajesh_in
Title: Nice drive by
Review: Necklace road is famous for it's food shops, hangout places and is around Hussain Sagar Lake. During our visit this time , since it was the 4th Formation day of the telangana state & Ramadan , the entire city & the necklace road were lit up with lights . It was a great sight and a nice drive by.

Name: mdviquaruddin
Title: friends time
Review: one of the beautiful places to hangout with friends and family for celebrating any occasion as the area contains many junk food shops , family restaurant and a multiplex nearby.must visit for everyone to enjoy the area and the food in nearby restaurants.

Name: deepa v
Title: Nice view.
Review: In hot summer in hyd...evenings can be spent at necklace road with friends or spouses.have some fast food stalls..must visit if in hyd.

Name: SVRSAGAR
Title: Apt Name! Its a Jewel around Hussian Sagar!
Review: The first that comes into mind when someone asks about hyderabad is Hussian Sagar and necklace road. Lot of recreation places around. Breezy walk, food courts, IMAX, tank bund, NTR Garden, Eat Street all round the road. You can go to Buddha statue which is mid of Lake from Eat street/Lumbini Park. Dont miss this place if you visit Hyderabad for first time!

Name: Nimmagadda D
Title: neck lace road
Review: the road which shapes like necklace road i feel  goodin this rood you can many plces like ntr gaht ntr garden etc

Name: SomnathKhaskel
Title: Not much to see but good for evening walk
Review: Clean and maintained road and shop - food courts .................. may be an Arial/bird's eye view required to enjoy the Necklace view.

Name: jmodi1981
Title: Nice Road
Review: This road has been named based on its shape which is Necklace type. when you pass through it you can understand the shape.

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Well maintained
Review: Hyderabad has been made attractive with the presence of Necklace Road. Well built and well maintained, this road is a pleasure to drive through

Name: Nirban P
Title: Really Looks like a Bright Necklace in the evening!
Review: Beautiful is the only word i can use for this place. With Eat Street in the center, Waterfront (a gourmet restaurant), and a few other happening places on it...this is a place where you can easily forget looking at your watch to keep track of time!!!

Name: Lalitha G
Title: nice place to njoy with friends and loved ones
Review: its a great place where will get shopping and food courts also. near by some placeses are availble to take kids to enjoy. its a place where always be rush and traffic.

Name: 962dhawals
Title: Very nice for an evening stroll
Review: It do looks like a Necklace in the evening as the name suggests. Just a casual walk on this road gives a refreshing feeling and top of it you can enjoy some wonderful street food. The evening breeze is a cherry on top.

Name: Known Traveller
Title: Necklace Road - Famous for Street Food
Review: Street food- You get awesome Street Food like Panipuri, Sweet Corn, Noodles, Fast Foods. The Taste is awesome. But you need check good places for Parking.

Name: Rashmi K
Title: Beautiful and well maintained road
Review: We went to this place last week and likes it alot.It is literally like a necklace and name seems apt when you see this road at night. Very beautifully designed and well maintained road.

Name: Joe L
Title: Interesting
Review: Not a bad place to go if you are looking to kill some time and see Hyderabad.   There are a few places to stop along the way for pictures and to see the lake.

Name: rcreviews
Title: Necklace ariel view
Review: Surrounding the hussain sagar the road become a necklace shape which can be observe by ariel view.Standing Buddha inside the Hussain Sagar is another attraction in necklace road.

Name: Shubho
Title: Absolutely nothing to see
Review: We went at 7:30 pm IST and there was no boat ride. No decent eateries and place was not even illuminated well. There were very few people at the venue. Not worth our time and effort to reach there.

Name: 24x7TravellingBoy
Title: Necklace of Hyderbad
Review: Truly this road is like a necklace, nice beautiful road for driving at evening, the eat street is available here which is a good place for chats and fun activities, the NTR gardens are also near this which has many fun activities and hangout places. This is for people of all age groups.

Name: Travellove1025
Title: Simple yet romantic place
Review: We have been here a multiple number of times but never get bored of just sitting here and talking. You will feel the love is in the air. Though getting a bench facing lake to sit is difficult as the place is almost always full.

Name: Rahul S Khatri
Title: One Time Visit
Review: The Evening time is perfect to Visit this Area. One can visit Buddha status, NTR Garden, many other nearby attraction places all together. The only problem is the stinking water.

Name: Yaminee B
Title: Secenic Hyderabad
Review: It is pleasant to visit this place in evening time. Mostly young crowd found here unlike rest of the area in Hyderabad. Good to visit with couple. Sitting place and chat is available around.

Name: subrat71
Title: heaven for morning joggers
Review: Has a good green cover. Recently the whole area was renovated. Attraction is Sanjeeviah Park. can spend time with family.

Name: Raja S
Title: Necklace Road a Must Place To Visit if you are in town
Review: Most happening place in town, Tank bund, to Prasad IMAX, Eat Street, Jalavihar Water Park after that Biggest Indian FLAG and so on you can take a MMTS and Reach this Place

Name: Indranil B
Title: Nice Pleace for evening walk
Review: Its nice and serene, specially I prefer in the evening. you can take a stroll and experience the street food

Name: Sumeetsali
Title: Necklace road - Nice Place
Review: Necklace road is a nice place to visit especially with family and friends and teenagers. Children will love it as it has many fun elements.

Name: smandal2858
Title: Necklace Road
Review: Necklace road is in perimeter of Hussein Sagar Lake . It is between twin city Hyderabad and Secunderabad. The journey along with necklace road in morning and night is scenin drive. You can enjoy street food along with the road. NTR garden, Lumbini park, sanjivani park are situated beside the road.

Name: richa t
Title: Necklace Road- To be visited after sunset
Review: Its nice  and serene, Especially i prefer in the evening. you can take a stroll and experience the street food

Name: Sam S
Title: The busy necklace road.
Review: This was built during the 1990's by CM Chenna Reddy to ease the traffic. Punjagutta roads were constructed. I visited Chanakya, Chaitanya colleges to seek admission into Intermediate course. The traffic goes high speed. There are rallies and narrow lanes joining the main road. Its convenient to go to the hitec city via Erram Manzil or go to Secunderabad or Ameerpet but the traffic chaos at the evening near Jalavihar is pathetic.

Name: Aartichand
Title: Scenic drive
Review: The Necklace road is a scenic drive with views of the Tank Bund, the Buddha Statue. The road is good and the large garden has many visitors. If one wants to stroll around they can. One of the more famous landmarks of the twin cities.

Name: Arun S
Title: Enjoy your walk here
Review: Its a good place to enjoy evening or morning walks alongside this road which surrounds the hussain sagar lake, gives very relaxing feeling. Nothing more than that.

Name: joshisandeep
Title: Necklace Road
Review: It is beautiful road to visit, take a complete round in the evening. It gives good experience. it was good

Name: Rajani K
Title: Enjoy an evening walk here
Review: This road encircles the Hussain Sagar lake and is in close proximity to NTR garden and Lumbini park.  It's a nice place to enjoy a morning or evening walk.  The road has  clean, well maintained adjacent lawns and benches are also there to sit.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice place for morning walk
Review: This is the place hundreds of people come for walking .Scenic hussain sagar will be there and places to sit and relax are present.Nice place to venture
